name: TKTokenDriver.Configuration
desc: A configuration for one class of token.

items.name: var classID: TKTokenDriver.ClassID
items.desc: The class identifier of the token driver.

items.name: var tokenConfigurations: [TKToken.InstanceID : TKToken.Configuration]
items.desc: A dictionary of all currently configured tokens for this token class, which the token instance identifier keys.

items.name: class var driverConfigurations: [TKTokenDriver.ClassID : TKTokenDriver.Configuration]
items.desc: A dictionary of token class configurations which the class identifier of the token driver keys.

items.name: func addTokenConfiguration(for: TKToken.InstanceID) -> TKToken.Configuration
items.desc: Creates a configuration object for a token with the token instance identifier you specify.

items.name: func removeTokenConfiguration(for: TKToken.InstanceID)
items.desc: Removes a configuration for a token with the token instance identifier you specify.
